text: Hello. You know what is a great charity? Save the Children.
Really, well can you tell me more about this charity?
Sure. They work to help children around the world.
How exactly do they help the children around the world? Education, Food, Medicine, etc.
They promote children's rights. They provide emergency relief. They also provide food and other resources to children in developing nations.
That sounds wonderful! Have you checked out how much of each $ goes directly to the children? Like how much does admin cost?
They are rated very highly on Charity Navigator for transparency and efficiency. Over 88 cents on the dollar goes directly to help children.
That is a high percent. I am just a bit worried about donating to charities. I donated every month for years to United Way, until the admin was arrested for embezzling!!!
That's a very reasonable concern. Save the Children has been helping kids for nearly 100 years. They are one of the most trusted charities in the world.
I also like to donate to local charities; Loaves and Fishes, Good Will, and Salvation Army.

Those are all great causes. One great thing about Save the Children is their international scope. For example, millions of Syrian children with a constant threat of violence. That is a crisis that requires an international solution.
Agreed. Well I would like to donate 1.00.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I would like to donate $1.00 to Save the Children.
That's wonderful and generous. That money which is relatively inconsequential will help tremendously.
I am pleased to see that it will help.
Thank you again for helping. For more information visit  URL
Sure thing. Have a great day!
How do we finish?
LOL... I have no idea; and was just thinking the same myself.
Ok. That did it. Have a good one.
